languages.text: "Все доводы приняты. Слово передается Вольному Торговцу для вынесения вердикта".
"All arguments have been acknowledged. Let the Rogue Trader's verdict be delivered."
languages.original_text: "Все доводы приняты. Слово передается Вольному Торговцу для вынесения вердикта".

traits.locale_text: "All arguments have been acknowledged. I will now turn it over to the Rogue Trader who will deliver {mf|his|her} verdict."
"All arguments have been acknowledged. I will now turn it over to the Rogue Trader who will deliver {mf|his|her} verdict."

languages.text: "Alle Argumente wurden geprüft. Möge {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} das Urteil verkünden."
languages.original_text: "All arguments have been acknowledged. Let the Rogue Trader's verdict be delivered."

traits.locale_text: "Alle Argumente wurden geprüft. Möge {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} das Urteil verkünden."

languages.text: « Tous les arguments ont été pris en considération. Que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} rende son verdict. »
languages.original_text: "All arguments have been acknowledged. Let the Rogue Trader's verdict be delivered."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les arguments ont été pris en considération. Que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} rende son verdict. »

languages.text: “双方的主张已经得到认可，让行商浪人传达判决吧。”
languages.original_text: "All arguments have been acknowledged. Let the Rogue Trader's verdict be delivered."

traits.locale_text: “双方的主张已经得到认可，让行商浪人传达判决吧。”

languages.text: «Todos los argumentos han sido escuchados. Que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente dicte sentencia».
languages.original_text: "All arguments have been acknowledged. Let the Rogue Trader's verdict be delivered."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los argumentos han sido escuchados. Que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente dicte sentencia».

languages.text: 「すべての議論が承認された。ローグトレーダーの判決が下される」
languages.original_text: "All arguments have been acknowledged. Let the Rogue Trader's verdict be delivered."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての議論が承認された。ローグトレーダーの判決が下される」

languages.text: "Tüm iddialar dinlenmiştir. Hür Tacir'in hükmü bekleniyor."
languages.original_text: "All arguments have been acknowledged. Let the Rogue Trader's verdict be delivered."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm iddialar dinlenmiştir. Hür Tacir'in hükmü bekleniyor."
